biotools.summary: Implementation of a new method for inferring branch lengths and site-specific substitution rates from nucleotide sequences. It makes use of the Bayesian Markov Chain Monte Carlo method and of the uniformization (randomization) technique to calculate sequence substitution probabilities in complicated DNA substitution models such as general time reversible model (GTR).

bioschemas.name: BYPASSR
bioschemas.summary: Implementation of a new method for inferring branch lengths and site-specific substitution rates from nucleotide sequences. It makes use of the Bayesian Markov Chain Monte Carlo method and of the uniformization (randomization) technique to calculate sequence substitution probabilities in complicated DNA substitution models such as general time reversible model (GTR).
